item.title: Mom of Karoline Leavitt’s nephew rejects White House narrative of her ICE arrest
item.description: In an interview, Bruna Ferreira, who chose the White House press secretary as her son’s godmother, contested the portrayal of her as a criminal, absen...

item.title: Trump’s latest anti-immigration push echoes the nativism of the 1920s
item.description: The president and his aides have escalated anti-immigrant rhetoric and policies in recent weeks.

item.title: The U.S. citizens getting caught in Trump’s immigration crackdown
item.description: Latinos describe being detained and assaulted by officers who want to know: “Where were you born?”

item.title: Trump says he’s ‘fixed’ the Kennedy Center as its signature weekend begins
item.description: The president, who has fired the center’s leaders and changed its programming, basked in applause from allies Saturday.
